Total_Assets.description: Sum of everything a company owns of value (current and non-current), as shown on the balance sheet.

Current_Assets.description: Assets expected to be converted into cash or used up within one year (e.g., cash, inventory, receivables).

Inventory.description: Value of goods held for sale or production at the reporting date.

Cash.description: Money in cash or checking accounts immediately available for use.

Marketable_Securities.description: Short-term investments that are easily converted to cash (e.g., treasury bills).

Accounts_Receivable.description: Money owed to the company by customers for goods/services delivered but not yet paid for.

Accounts_Payable.description: Amounts owed to suppliers or vendors for goods/services received but not yet paid.

Total_Liabilities.description: All debts and obligations owed to others, both short- and long-term.

Current_Liabilities.description: Obligations due to be settled within one year.

Total_Debt.description: Sum of all interest-bearing debt, short-term and long-term.

Shareholders_Equity.description: Owners’ residual interest in the company’s assets after liabilities are paid.

Revenue_a_k_a_Sales.description: Total income from normal business operations before expenses.

Cost_of_Goods_Sold_COGS.description: Direct costs to produce goods or services sold (materials, labor, etc.).

Operating_Income_EBIT.description: Profit from normal business operations, before interest and taxes.

EBITDA.description: Earnings before Interest, Taxes, Depreciation, and Amortization; measures pure operating performance.

Net_Income.description: The company’s profit after all expenses, taxes, and non-operating items.

Operating_Expenses_and_sub_items_SG_A_Ad.description: Day-to-day expenses not directly tied to production or sales (includes Selling, General & Admin, Advertising, Research & Development).

Interest_Income.description: Income earned from lending or investing in interest-bearing assets.

Lease_Expense.description: Payments recognized for using leased property or equipment.

Depreciation.description: Allocation of a tangible asset’s cost over its useful life.

Amortization.description: Allocation of an intangible asset’s cost over its expected life.

Capital_Expenditures_Capex.description: Spending on acquiring or maintaining fixed assets, like equipment or buildings.

Operating_Cash_Flow.description: Cash generated from normal business operations.

Net_Patient_Revenue.description: Gross patient revenue minus adjustments and discounts (used in healthcare).

Net_Operating_Income_NOI.description: Income from property operations after expenses, but before interest and taxes (real estate).

Order_Backlog.description: Value of all confirmed customer orders not yet fulfilled.

Work_in_Progress.description: Value of partially completed goods or projects.

Total_Contract_Value.description: Aggregate value of a customer contract (especially in project-based businesses).

Retention_Receivables.description: Amounts held back (not paid yet) by clients as retention on contracts (construction).

Reserves_Added.description: Newly discovered or acquired energy reserves (oil/gas).

Reserves_Extracted_Produced.description: Amount of reserves produced/used during a period (oil/gas).

Total_Production.description: Total output of goods or resources in a given period (often used in oil/gas).

Production_Transport_Costs.description: Expenses incurred to move produced goods/resources to market.

Barrels_Produced.description: Number of oil barrels (or equivalent unit) produced during the period.

Loan_Amount.description: Principal borrowed, outstanding at a given time.

Collateral_Value_Property_Value.description: Market value of assets pledged as security for loans.

Debt_Service_Principal_Interest_Payments.description: Total scheduled loan repayments, including both principal and interest.

Annual_Admissions.description: Number of patients admitted to a facility in a year (healthcare).

Average_Number_of_Beds.description: Mean number of licensed or staffed beds available (hospitals).

Operating_Expenses_ex_Depreciation.description: All operating costs, excluding depreciation and sometimes other non-cash items.

Earning_Assets.description: Assets generating income, typically in banking (e.g., loans, investments).

Average_Earning_Assets.description: Mean value of assets during the period that generate income.

Loan_Loss_Provisions.description: Expected credit losses set aside for bad loans (banking).

Total_Loans.description: Total value of loans held by a financial institution.

Leased_Space.description: Total amount of property (e.g., square feet/meters) currently leased to tenants.

Total_Available_Space.description: Total space that is rentable or available for lease.

Average_Subscribers.description: Mean monthly or period count of active subscribers (telecom/software).

Total_Service_Revenue.description: Total revenue from providing services to customers.

Subscribers_at_Start_End_of_Period.description: Number of subscribers/customers at the beginning and end of a period.

Customers_at_Start_End_of_Period.description: Number of customers at the beginning and end of a period.

Annual_Recurring_Revenue_ARR.description: Annualized value of recurring revenue (typically in SaaS/subscription businesses).

Number_of_Transactions.description: Total sales or purchase transactions over a period.

Foot_Traffic.description: Number of people entering a retail location.

Sales_for_Stores_Open_gt_1_Year.description: Revenue from stores that have been open more than a year; used to measure 'same-store' performance.

Physical_Inventory_Count.description: Actual inventory counted physically on hand.

Recorded_Inventory.description: Inventory balance according to the company’s records or books.

Number_of_Drug_Trials_Total_and_Successf.description: Number of pharmaceutical trials started and the number completed with positive results.

Sales_from_Patent_Protected_Drugs.description: Revenue generated from products under patent protection (pharma).

Market_Value_of_Equity_MVE.description: Total market capitalization: share price times number of outstanding shares.
